title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and RAG.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; synchronous & asynchronous APIs, Android compatible.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, generate, and pull models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s spot; inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG with Chroma, function-calling, fine-tune adapters, GPU tweaks, Docker Swarm.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Docker-compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Open-WebUI, and NVIDIA runtime for quick local labs.

title: chainlit-ollama
summary: Chainlit cookbook showing how to build a chat app with Ollama and real-time UI in 30 lines.

title: ollama-rag-langchain-chatbot
summary: End-to-end RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Llama2, Chroma vector store, and Gradio UI.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module that exposes Ollama as a provider with decorators for chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; small, idiomatic, and mirrors the REST API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLMs via Ollama for note Q&A and summarization.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Lightweight Discord.py bot that streams Ollama responses into any channel with slash commands.

title: ollama-powershell
summary: PowerShell module wrapping the Ollama REST API; chat, pull, and list models from Windows terminals.
